Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu

Ndị ọrụ lara ezumike nka nọ n'akwa arịri dịka ọtụtụ n'ime ha anatabeghị ego gọọmentị kwesịrị ịkwụ ha. BBC mere nyocha were kpuhee ala nkịta nọ na ya bụ atụmatụ eji akwụ ndị lara ezumike nka ụgwọ ọnwa ha.
